evidence.text: Person B: Just that pockmark or whatever it is. It’s nothing. No one would think anything of it. But blown up like that, of course they’re gonna wanna smooth it over. What’d they pay you?
Person B: So you got screwed.
Person A: How long has this been going on, you prick?

Person A: So, Edward...
Person B: Don’t call me that.
Person A: Does this mask have your little pockmark thing?
